column1: Smoque BBQ////Amazing food! The brisket is sent from heaven above
column2: and the coleslaw - UNREAL. The side salad is a nice accompaniment to the meat
column3: and byob is always appreciated. Great service and staff - will be back. Next time I will remember that you can't byob and eat outside. We had to move inside after popping open the wine
column4: but the atmosphere inside was just as nice.
